Chapter 2564 - 2564 Chapter 2564-Frightening Enemy

2564 Chapter 2564-frightening enemy

Lu Ming used all his strength and became one with his sword. Ile turned into a dazzling sword light and attacked the humanoid bat.

Pfft!

Blood splattered everywhere. One of the bat-shaped creature’s wings was almost cut off. He screamed and quickly retreated.

Before Lu Ming activated the double combat strength formula, his combat strength was weaker than a second-level void G.o.d Realm powerhouse. However, after activating the double combat strength formula, his abilitics had completely surpa.s.sed a second-level void G.o.d Realm powerhouse.

“Kill!”

Lu Ming simply stared at the humanoid bat and kept slashing at it.

However, the bald man had also arrived. He joined forces with the humanoid bat to fight Lu Ming.

As for the giant python, it was hiding in the distance, controlling the snake-shaped thin sword from afar to attack Lu Ming,

BOOM! BOOM!

The two sides continued fight and exchanged dozens of moves. Even though Lu Ming was fighting onc against three, he still had the upper hand.

Puchi!

One of the bat-like creature’s wings was completely chopped off by Lu Ming. Blood splattered in all directions and drowned the entire mountain.

“Ah, brat, ant, I’m going to break your head…

The human-shaped bat roared in anger, but what welcomed it was Lu Ming’s sword gleam.

The sword light flashed, and one of the bat-like creature’s wings was almost cut off. It was so scared that it retreated.

Clang!

Lu Ming turned around and swung his sword. His sword collided with the bald man’s and the bald man was sent flying.

“d.a.m.n it, how is this kid so strong?”

The bald man’s face was gloomy as he retreated to the Python’s side.

As for the human-shaped bat, he hurriedly came to the bald man and the others ‘side. The three of them gathered together, not daring to separate.

“What do we do? This brat is too strong. We can’t kill him, nor can we tear the heaven suppressing seal!” The giant python said.

where’s Su tu? why isn’t he here yet? once he’s here, we can deal with this kid!

The human-shaped bat said.

Hmph, you’re really useless. You can’t even deal with a native from a small chiliocosm!

Suddenly, a cold and arrogant voice sounded. The void trembled and a figure appeared out of thin air. This figure looked similar to a human. He had a well-proportioned body, but his eyes were cold and filled with a faint arrogance.

“Su tu!”

Secing this person, the bald man, the human-shaped bat, and the giant python were all overjoyed.

su tu, this person has mastered the path of a ruler. It’s best not to kill him. Capture him alive and offer him

to young master. Young master will definitely be overjoyed!

The bald man said.

“Understood!”

Su tu nodded. He looked at Lu Ming and said indifferently,” “Brat, surrender without resistance and you can suffer less physical pain!”

“If you want to take me down, then let’s see if you have the ability!”

Lu Ming said coldly. The purple-gold light on his body grew thicker and thicker.

However, his heart was heavy because he couldn’t see through this person called su tu at all.

“You’re overestimating yoursell!’

Su tu’s cold voice was heard. He then took a step forward and in an instant, he was close to Lu Ming and threw a punch.

BOOM!

This punch contained a terrifying power. The terrifying power compressed the void and crushed toward Lu Ming with an earth-shattering force.

There was no way to avoid it, so he could only take it head-on.

Lu Ming growled and gathered all his energy, slashing with all his might.

BOOM!

Lu Ming felt as if he had slashed at an iron wall. Endless power surged and the combat sword vibrated continuously, almost flying away.

Lu Ming was sent flying by the punch. His body was like a meteorite, crashing to the ground. The ground shook violently, and a huge pit with a radius of hundreds of thousands of miles appeared. Everything was turned into ashes, and the surrounding tens of millions of miles were covered with cracks. Fortunately, all living beings within a hundred million miles of the heaven suppressing scal had been evacuated. Otherwise, countless living beings would have died.

“Lu Ming…”

In the distance, Xie nianqing’s face turned pale with fear. His eyes were filled with worry.

BOOM!

However, in the next moment, a purple-gold light, burst out of the huge pit. It was La Ming.

At this moment, Lu Ming felt as if his entire body was about to split apart. Waves of excruciating pain radiated from his body. Even though he had circulated the indestructible ancient scroll, it was of no use. His recovery was very slow.

“What terrifying strength!”

Lu Ming was shocked. This su tu was definitely a terrifying existence. His strength was far above second-level void G.o.d Realm.

The ancestral Dragon said that the small chiliocosm would be in great danger if anyone above the fourth level of the void G.o.d Realm entered. Hence, this person was most likely at the third level of the void G.o.d Realm.

not bad, not bad. You can still struggle after taking one of my moves. Your talent is not bad even in the primeval universe. Unfortunately, your fate is already decided!

Su tu’s eyes became even colder, and there was even a trace of jealousy,

BOOM!

An extremely terrifying aura burst out from su tu’s body.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

Kachaa…

In the sky, a m.u.f.fled roar was heard. An extremely terrifying scene appeared. With su tu as the center, the void kept exploding, and ferocious spatial cracks appeared. It was as if the entire world was going to collapsc. “The s.p.a.ce in this small world is really weak. However, it’s just enough for me to use. Kill!”

Su tu’s expression turned ferocious. He suddenly rushed toward Lu Ming.

Lu Ming’s pupils contracted sharply. He was highly focused and his energy, Qi, and spirit were adjusted to

their peak.

Buzzzzzz!

Lu Ming’s figure retreated rapidly!

“You can’t retreat!”

Su tu’s cold voice was heard. His speed was even faster and more shocking. He approached Lu Ming at an extreme speed and threw a punch.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The void within a radius of millions of miles exploded instantly, forming a terrifying spatial storm that. engulfed Lu Ming,

Terrifying. Su tu’s power was too terrifying. Every move he made had the power to destroy the world. If he were to use all his strength to bombard the ground, he would definitely blow up the entire tai Qing heavenly

region.

No wonder the ancestral Dragon said that if an existence that was too strong entered the small chiliocosm, it

would collapse.

The stability of a small chiliocosm couldn’t be compared to the primal universe.

Faced with su tu’s attack, Lu Ming could not avoid it.

‘Break, Break, Break!”

Lu Ming roared and slashed his combat sword continuously.

However, su tu’s strength was too strong. Lu Ming felt the combat sword shake violently. His body was sent

flying again and he crashed into the ground, causing the ground to crack continuously.

Lu Ming spat out a mouthful of blood. He was severely injured. He immediately took out a life fruit and swallowed it. Alter swallowing the life fruit, his injuries healed rapidly.

I even have this kind of G.o.dly medicine. However, it’s useless!

Su tu stepped forward and punched out with both fists.

ROOM! ROOM! ROOM!

Waves of terrifying fist force crushed out. Lu Ming could not resist at all. He was. .h.i.t continuously and crashed to the ground.

This time, Lu Ming’s body almost exploded. His entire body was covered in cracks and he no longer looked human. Even with the life fruit, was difficult for him to recover.
